Shopple for shoppers

More flexible,
Less intrusive

Earn up to R55/hr or more shopping for Shopple members. Deliver things people love, from the stores they trust.

Why partner with Shopple?

Shopple is a membership-based shopping marketplace, enabling delivery of trendy fashion items, hot food and household essentials.

Shopple is about more than online shopping. Whether you're looking to pay bills or fund dreams, Shopple will get you there.

Work on your schedule

Work part time or full time – any time.
Set your own hours for a completely flexible schedule.

Choose your wheels

Get tips from other shoppers, attend launch parties, and get a free Shopple membership.

Earn money as you shop

Experienced shoppers make an average of R50/hr.
* Paychecks are delivered every week.

Requirements:

  • 18 years of age minimum
  • Reliable vehicle, 15 years old or newer
  • iPhone (iOS 8 or newer) or Android (5.4.2 or newer)
  • Valid RSA driver's license and auto insurance
  • Thorough background check required
  • Insulated cooler bag
  • Knowledge of product selection
  • Ability to lift 24+ pounds

Want to get paid to shop with Shopple?

Apply to be a Shopple Shopper today and start achieving your goals.
